casebody.data:
ALCOA ENGINEERED STRUCTURES, Petitioner-Appellant,
v.
MICHIGAN OCCUPATIONAL SAFETY AND HEALTH ADMINISTRATION, Respondent-Appellee. SC: 158757
COA: 343604 Supreme Court of Michigan. December 14, 2018

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of respondent-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer is GRANTED.

The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before January 9, 2019.
